root.name: Who's That Flying?!
root.description: OverviewWho's that Flying?! is a side-scrolling shooter by Mediatonic wherein the cities of Earth are striked by "Doom Beasts" and the hero the player controls has to battle them, while also trying to uncover who or what is behind these attacks.Game FeaturesStory mode featuring 15 levels over 5 unique stages11 enemy types5 gigantic boss battles4 Infinite Mode Stages24 Challenge Mode Stages14 Bonus Magazine articles to unlock12 Glittering Awards to discover6 Dramatic Courtroom cutscenesSteam Achievements, Global Leaderboards Steam Cloud SupportController SupportPC System RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP / Vista / 7Processor: 2Ghz or HigherRAM Memory: 1 GBVideo Card: 32 MB, DirectX CompatibleHard Drive Space: 400 MGDirectX: 9.0cSound: Windows compatible sound card
